quote: “A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.\" Elbert Hubbard

step_of_the_day.title:
Pillar #2 of Resilience and Success is your relationship with others. Today hold the intention of connecting
            in a meaningful way with someone you are close to. Enhance your feelings of belonging today (Pillar #2)
step_of_the_day.content:
Paul Simon sang, “I am a rock, I am an Island. And a rock feels no pain, and an Island never cries.\" And of
            course, the pain and tears he is referring to only go underground and fuel anger and depression. And most of
            all, it denies a basic need of all of us; the need to belong and feel connected. The satisfaction of these
            needs helps physically – it supports optimal nervous system balance and resilience - and it helps
            emotionally and even mentally.

action_step:
Today make contact with someone close to you. But don’t just ask them how they are doing, see if you can go
            deeper with your conversation. Let them know how important they are in your life. Express appreciation and
            gratitude. And then notice how this makes you feel, and how it supports your own self-image.
journal_entry: Write about the deep connections you have and how they make you feel.
